item.title: Next move in U.S.-China trade truce could boost these 2 major chip stocks, Piper Sandler says
item.description: The recent suspension of U.S.-China tariffs for 90 days could translate into future gains for two chipmakers, according to Piper Sandler.

item.title: An improving market outlook makes this oil refiner a buy, Goldman Sachs says
item.description: A more upbeat oil market outlook could lead to more upside for shares of this refiner, according to Goldman Sachs.

item.title: Raymond James says this AI-related stock is a buy with more than 20% upside
item.description: The artificial intelligence boom should drive shares of this server maker higher in the months ahead, according to Raymond James.

item.title: Coinbase's entry into S&P 500 is a watershed moment for crypto industry, analysts say
item.description: On Monday evening, S&P Dow Jones Indices said Coinbase will be added to the benchmark S&P 500 stock index before trading begins on May 19.

item.title: An options strategy to play a potential rebound in this beaten down delivery giant
item.description: For this trade, I'm taking a contrarian stance on this beaten-down name, especially as the technical charts start to hint at a possible bounce.
